TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Border3DStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the style of a three-dimensional border.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawBorder3D%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawBorder3D%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the Border3DStyle enumeration. To run this example paste the following code in a form that imports the System.Windows.Forms and System.Drawing namespaces. Ensure the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event is associated with the event-handling method in this example.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaintMembers#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.b_4_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaintMembers#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.b_4_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaintMembers#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.b_4_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Adjust = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: The border is drawn outside the specified rectangle, preserving the dimensions of the rectangle for drawing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Bump = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The inner and outer edges of the border have a raised appearance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Etched = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The inner and outer edges of the border have an etched appearance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Flat = int32(16394)

Docs.summary: The border has no three-dimensional effects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Raised = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The border has raised inner and outer edges.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle RaisedInner = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The border has a raised inner edge and no outer edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle RaisedOuter = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The border has a raised outer edge and no inner edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle Sunken = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The border has sunken inner and outer edges.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle SunkenInner = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The border has a sunken inner edge and no outer edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle SunkenOuter = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The border has a sunken outer edge and no inner edge.
